About me

I am a third year Ph.D. student in the Department of Mathematics at UC Berkeley. My advisor is Will Fithian, and I am co-advised by David Aldous. I completed a B.S. with honors in mathematics with a computer science minor at Caltech. I was born in Toronto, Ontario and grew up in Hong Kong and California.

I took my qualifying exam on August 11 2016. The syllabus can be found here (TeX, PDF).
